targetLine.text: No, no, no. You and Jennifer both turn out fine. It's your kids, Marty. Something has gotta be done about your kids.
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part II

contextBefore.text: Wait a minute, Doc. What are you talkin’ about? What happens to us in the future? What, do we become assholes or somethin’?

contextAfter.text: Hey, Doc, we better back up. We don't have enough road to get up to 88.
Roads? Where we're going, we don't need roads.
Say, Marty! Marty! Marty, I wanted to show you these new matchbooks for my auto detailing I had printed up.

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
